title: how to boot wondows iso file from usb

forumNotes.author: medax
forumNotes.content: hi, i have a iso file of windows but is not on cd it is on my hard drive, how can i make it bootable from usb

forumNotes.author: Brito
forumNotes.content:
You can mount the ISO image using imdisk (use search on this forum to find it)  

Then follow one of these tutorials according to the windows that you have:  

Install XP from USB  
[http://www.boot-land...?showtopic=4900](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=4900 "External link")  

Install Windows 7/Vista from USB  
[http://www.boot-land...?showtopic=6800](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=6800 "External link")
